As part of team Tiger Lilies for Nonprofits, we gathered requirements, architected, designed,  and are currently developing a solution for the Arizonans for Children's Mentoring Program. The application consists of a web application for the Administrator to manage data, a REST API provider, and an iOS/Android mobile app for mentors to get information about the foster children to mentor.Arizonans for Childrenhttp://arizonansforchildren.org/
recommendations: Nmuta Timothy Jones
Managing Lead Instructor at Galvanize Inc
November 11, 2017, Nmuta Timothy was Shu Sia’s teacher

My name is Nmuta Jones; I've served as a technology teacher / professor for a total of over 10 years.  I've taught hundreds of students and I've seen many people come through various programs and climb through various rigorous obstacles in order to graduate and eventually succeed. With that said, I can comfortably say that on behalf of my entire teaching staff at Galvanize, Shu Sia pretty much floored everyone with her performance, overall technical aptitude, grit, determination, and problem solving abilities. Shu Sia's ability to write and understand software is remarkable.  Over the period of six months,  I witnessed her not only get through all of the "base" and "stretch" goals that we presented the students in the Full Stack web development curriculum, but on top of that Shu Sia put together some of the most breathtaking projects from the very beginning of the program all they way to her final presentation at the end. Shu Sia's final capstone presentation had the strength of 4 capstone presentations rolled into one.  She integrated web sockets, Node js,  React, postgres,  a VUI with voice recognition / language processing,  great design, and several other features that constituted an amazingly robust app having only had 10 days to put the whole thing together. As amazed as I was, I wasn't surprised. This is what it had been like with Shu Sia from day one of her enrollment in the program. I remember the first week looking at student submissions in our learning management system and next to Shu Sia's name was a continual stream of green checkmarks all the way down the row.  Always passing tests, always quietly aggressive and winning, always smiling, joyful and happy , and a joy to work with. This level of achievement and discipline continued steadily over the next six months. As of November 2017, (this month), I HIGHLY recommend Shu Sia for any senior level position in web development or for a Solutions Architect position.  Her ability to ramp up to unfamiliar environments will not disappoint. Shu Sia delivers, is consistent, reliable, steady, and a very positive , team-player kind of person. She's very driven but also collaborative and is always willing to help others which would make her fit really well in either an Agile shop or a shop where she's a lone wolf coder working on her own.  The discipline is there, the accountability is there,  the passion is there... it's difficult to think of anything that she doesn't do well.  Shu Sia is very well rounded and technically strong. If you have any more detailed questions, please feel free to reach out to me here on LinkedIn.  Thanks.

Mary Tafuri
Director at IBM
April 13, 2017, Mary was senior to Shu Sia but didn’t manage directly

I have been Shu Sia's Director for a few years and I highly recommend her. She has a great personality to work with and goes out of her way to make herself available to others. She always seemed to selflessly pitch in to help. Her colleagues bank on her making deliverable schedules. As a senior technical leader, Shu Sia has a lot to offer and has the attitude that others want to follow and work with. She is also a quick learner. She is always ready for new challenges and put in her utmost effort to get it done right

I've worked with Shu Sia for several years and have always been impressed with her enthusiasm and commitment for her work.  She is one of the few technical individuals who can tenaciously follow though on projects and simultaneously be a pleasure to work with.  No matter what was asked, she focused on the goal and could work with anyone, no matter their personality type.  Such diligence and commitment showed me that Shu Sia understands the value of working in teams, executing her role and helping others succeed. I'd work with Shu Sia on any program.  It's always easy to work with people you respect.  She is a pleasure.

Wei (Will) Luo
Technical Sales Leader, IBM Digital Experience Software at IBM
March 5, 2012, Wei (Will) was senior to Shu Sia but didn’t manage directly

I have been working with Shu Sia on and off for over ten years. Over this rather long period of time, I know Shu Sia well to recommend her as a top talent developer and a great customer advocate of IBM technology. She is amazing in adopting new technology and apply it to our daily work and create value for our customers. As a result, many of my customers viewed her as their trusted adviser. She is great with customer interactions, including presentations, demonstrations, and group discussions. She's also very personable and easy to work with, and committed to deadlines and responsibilities.I have no reservation to recommend Shu Sia to anyone for her skills, personality, and attitude. It is always a pleasure to work with her.

summary: I am a technical oriented professional with experience in full life cycle application development, architecture, technical pre-sales, software solutions delivery, and IT training.Throughout my career, I have demonstrated the ability to understand and translate client requirements, implement proof of concepts, demonstrations as well as presenting justification of the technical solutions and proposals.I am a firm believer of continually re-inventing myself. When I discovered Galvanize, I saw it as a perfect opportunity to deepen my application development skills and increase the value I can provide to my clients.I will be completing the Galvanize Web Development Immersive program in October 2017, after which I plan to pursue a career in the greater Phoenix metro area.
name: Shu Sia Lukito
title: Solution Architect, Full Stack Developer, Sales Engineer
